prompt-hotels: [{"TASK":"Curate hotel options for Devon Show Facility (venue_uid=dvn-venue)","Location":"city: Devon city_uid=devon, state:PA state_uid=pa.","GEO context":"lat=40.0459733, lon=-75.4194803 placeid=EiYyMyBEb3JzZXQgUmQgIzJjLCBEZXZvbiwgUEEgMTkzMzMsIFVTQSIeGhwKFgoUChIJOUhzpLuUxokRUa-DoF1_e3wSAjJj.","Official venue link":"https://www.devonhorseshow.net/","Audience":"Competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit (trainers, grooms, show parents). Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

Use authentic insider phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling).","Tone":"upbeat, practical, authoritative.","Official venue link":"https://www.devonhorseshow.net/","Constraints":null,"Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/section_profile_example.json","Minimum required JSON fields":"section_uid, section_type, section_title, section_overview, section_keywords, section_cta_text, section_img, section_img_alt, section_link, section_meta_description, section_open_graph_title, section_open_graph_description, section_search_title, section_search_description, section_spotlight"}]
data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "dvn-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "Devon Horse Show Grounds — Venue Profile",
  "section_overview": "Old-school prestige with big-ring polish. Devon runs tight and traditional: the Dixon Oval and the Gold Ring anchor the schedule, with tidy warm-ups, a clearly marked jog strip, and permanent shed-row stabling that keeps everything compact. Expect packed grandstands, brisk gate cadence, and quick drags—classes roll on time here. Vendor row doubles as the midway, so plan your tack and snack runs between drags. Footing firms up nicely after a little traffic; hunters and eq appreciate the smooth rhythm, while jumpers get reliable purchase under lights. Mornings are cool, afternoons can get sun-glare on the long approach, and evenings cool off fast—layer up and keep quarter sheets handy. If you stage well and move with purpose, Devon rewards efficient riders.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "Devon Horse Show",
    "Dixon Oval",
    "Gold Ring",
    "A-circuit",
    "hunter jumper",
    "equitation",
    "Grand Prix",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "ring flow",
    "country fair"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Lock in your Devon game plan",
  "section_img": "https://www.devonhorseshow.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/devon-dixon-oval-grandstands.jpg",
  "section_img_alt": "The Dixon Oval and grandstands at the Devon Horse Show Grounds",
  "section_link": "https://www.devonhorseshow.net/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for the Devon Horse Show Grounds: warm-up strategy, jog strip logistics, vendor row essentials, stabling flow, footing notes, and time-saving tips for A-circuit hunter/jumper riders.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "Devon Horse Show Grounds — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Authoritative notes on ring flow, the jog strip, vendor row, stabling logistics, and footing so you can move efficiently all week at Devon.",
  "section_search_title": "Devon Horse Show Grounds Venue Profile (Devon, PA)",
  "section_search_description": "Practical, rider-focused overview of Devon: warm-up timing, jog strip details, vendor row, stabling, footing, and day-of-show logistics for hunters, eq, and jumpers.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for Devon",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up windows: busiest 40 minutes pre-eq and jr/am hunter trips—grab a fence right after a drag for clean tracks.",
      "Jog strip: numbers visible, legs spotless—keep a towel, rub rag, and hoof oil at the in-gate for rapid polish.",
      "Under lights: for night classes, walk the ring at dusk—sightlines and shadows change on long approaches.",
      "Footing feel: rides best with a little pack—time your last oxer once the top firms up post-traffic.",
      "Stabling flow: shed rows are tight—trunks flush to line, fans secured, ice boots staged outside for fast turnovers.",
      "Gate cadence: add/scratch early; in-gate runs briskly and will close on time between sections.",
      "Vendor row: quick fixes (hairnets, gloves, spur straps) plus on-the-spot braiding and minor tack repairs.",
      "Hand-walk route: use the perimeter lanes around vendor row when midway crowds spike.",
      "Ship-in timing: Lancaster Ave traffic compresses mornings—build in a buffer for unload and schooling.",
      "Weather plan: spring chill after sunset—stash quarter sheets, spare gloves, and a dry pad in a ring bag."
    ]
  }
}

data-dine-am:
{
  "venue_uid": "dvn-venue",
  "bucket": "am",
  "params": {
    "search_mode": "breakfast_only",
    "max_distance_m": 5000,
    "price_range": "$$",
    "cuisine_allowlist_any": ["American", "Cafe", "Bakery", "Diner", "Coffee", "Brunch", "Bagels"],
    "menu_keywords_any": ["breakfast", "morning", "brunch", "bagel", "egg", "omelet", "biscuit", "grits", "hash browns", "pancakes", "waffles", "french toast", "breakfast burrito", "breakfast sandwich", "latte", "coffee", "espresso", "cold brew", "pastry", "muffin", "croissant", "yogurt parfait", "oatmeal"],
    "hours_requirements": { "opens_by_or_before": "10:30", "days": ["Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat","Sun"] },
    "hard_excludes": ["dinner only", "steakhouse", "bar", "brewery", "cocktail", "wine bar", "nightclub", "late-night only", "reservation only", "members only"],
    "sort": ["distance_m", "opens_at", "reliability_score"]
  },
  "results": [

TASK: Curate venue links for [{"venue_official_name":"Devon Show Facility","state_uid":["recf4yV3u8VagAMin"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.devonhorseshow.net/","city_uid":["recejksa5uuPz9dj9"],"placeId":"EiYyMyBEb3JzZXQgUmQgIzJjLCBEZXZvbiwgUEEgMTkzMzMsIFVTQSIeGhwKFgoUChIJOUhzpLuUxokRUa-DoF1_e3wSAjJj","formatted_addressv3":"23 Dorset Road, Devon, PA 19333, USA","venue_recordId":"rec8Xa3ZTKPVli8yh"}] (venue_uid=[{"venue_official_name":"Devon Show Facility","state_uid":["recf4yV3u8VagAMin"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.devonhorseshow.net/","city_uid":["recejksa5uuPz9dj9"],"placeId":"EiYyMyBEb3JzZXQgUmQgIzJjLCBEZXZvbiwgUEEgMTkzMzMsIFVTQSIeGhwKFgoUChIJOUhzpLuUxokRUa-DoF1_e3wSAjJj","formatted_addressv3":"23 Dorset Road, Devon, PA 19333, USA","venue_recordId":"rec8Xa3ZTKPVli8yh"}]), Devon Horse Show represents an Equestrian Venue located near , Location: 23 Dorset Road, Devon, PA 19333, USA, GEO context: lat=40.0459733, lon=-75.4194803 placeid=EiYyMyBEb3JzZXQgUmQgIzJjLCBEZXZvbiwgUEEgMTkzMzMsIFVTQSIeGhwKFgoUChIJOUhzpLuUxokRUa-DoF1_e3wSAjJj., ### Venue Link Field Definitions - venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes
